definition: magical object/object symbolic of imperial power/fine weapon

sentences.english: Steelclad Serpent can't attack unless you control another artifact.
sentences.chinese: 除非你操控其他神器，否则覆铁巨蛇不能进行攻击。

sentences.english: Search your library for an artifact or enchantment card and reveal that card.
sentences.chinese: 自你的牌库中搜寻一张神器或结界牌，并展示该张牌。

sentences.english: Before his death, your uncle hid a mysterious artifact that only you could find.
sentences.chinese: 在临终前，你的叔叔藏起了一个只有你能找到的神器。

sentences.english: They venerate the Ventari Tablet as their most sacred artifact and testament.
sentences.chinese: 希尔瓦里人尊凡特里石碑为他们最重要的神器和圣约。

sentences.english: Together, we can unlock the artifact's secrets.
sentences.chinese: 一起合作，就能解开这件神器的秘密。

sentences.english: The second one is Equipment, which is a subtype of artifact.
sentences.chinese: 第二个则是武具，属于神器的副类别。

sentences.english: Search your library for an artifact card and put that artifact into play. Shuffle your library afterward.
sentences.chinese: 从你的牌库中搜寻任一张神器牌，并将其放置进场。

sentences.english: Indeed the old version really is one of many otaku are recognized thought of the film artifact.
sentences.chinese: 的确老版本确是众多宅男们认可的看片神器。

sentences.english: Brass drums are the Bouyei people's instruments of deity worshipping.
sentences.chinese: 铜鼓是布依族的神器礼器。

sentences.english: Like magical artifacts, these are legendary relics that whole campaigns can be based around.
sentences.chinese: 如同魔法神器一样，整个战役可以基于这些传奇遗物。

sentences.english: Suq 'Ata Assassin cannot be blocked except by artifact or black creatures.
sentences.chinese: 神器或黑色以外的生物皆不可阻挡舒夸塔刺客。

sentences.english: With the powerful Eye in his possession, Illidan traveled to the former wizard-city of Dalaran.
sentences.chinese: 伊利丹带着这个强大的神器来到魔法之城达拉然。

definition: Buddha's teaching/Buddhist monk's apparel, staff etc/(Daoism) magic weapon/talisman/fig. specially effective device/magic wand
outfit or suit (of clothes)/set of coordinated items/kit
canonical text/treasury (i.e. book of treasured wisdom)
unique skill/unexpected tricky move (as a last resort)/masterstroke/finishing blow
best quality/item of the highest quality/(slang) outrageous/annoying in the extreme/gross/person with these qualities
